mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_description, i.image_id, i.image_url, i.image_key, i.is_thumbnail FROM product p JOIN product_image i ON p.product_id = i.product_id AND i.is_thumbnail = 1 WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, img.image_url, p.product_created_at, l.region FROM wishlist w JOIN product p ON p.product_id = w.product_id LEFT JOIN product_image img ON img.product_id = p.product_id AND img.is_thumbnail = 1 LEFT JOIN location l ON l.location_id = p.location_id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC
